## Detailed Tables

Comprehensive tables for in-depth analysis. Drill down into individual IP indicators, CVE associations, and manually queried IPs.

markdown.content:
# ![GreyNoise Logo](https://files.readme.io/9ed004a-small-greynoisegreytrans.png) GreyNoise Threat Intelligence Indicator Dashboard
---
### This dashboard provides visibility into Internet-wide scan and attack activity using GreyNoise threat intelligence. It helps security teams:

1. Identify Threats: View malicious and suspicious IPs actively scanning or attacking the Internet.
1. Analyze Trends: Monitor indicator ingestion over time, top threat actors, and CVEs.
1. Investigate IPs: Drill down into detailed indicator tables with direct links to GreyNoise for further analysis.

dashboardCharts.name: efe4bd4c-35dc-4edf-bda6-af7c38274d5a
dashboardCharts.description: Top 10 ASNs (network providers) associated with observed IPs

dashboardCharts.name: eb41e19d-2fec-4585-868c-4a379d6ead12
dashboardCharts.description: Top 10 categories for Business Services (e.g., CDN, Search Engine).

dashboardCharts.name: 2528998e-a39c-469a-a234-e5930a95b998
dashboardCharts.description: List of IP addresses identified as Business Services, including service category, trust level, and descriptive context.

dashboardCharts.name: 36e22bc7-6a19-4e03-a1bc-a4a5d93af7d2
dashboardCharts.description: CVEs associated with observed IPs.

query.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$cve = graph.entity.asset.vulnerabilities.cve_id
$cve = ${cve}
$ip = graph.entity.ip
match:
    $ip
limit:
    100

dashboardCharts.name: 156d9dcd-ffd1-4477-af03-48fb2720e13a
dashboardCharts.description: Count of distinct IP addresses in GreyNoise intelligence data

markdown.content:
## Trends
---
Monitor indicator ingestion patterns over time. Track changes in threat activity and identify anomalies or spikes in specific classifications.

dashboardCharts.name: 9e2d013a-c72c-4645-a524-abb9737564ea
dashboardCharts.description: Top Operating Systems detected on source IPs.

dashboardCharts.name: c380e335-a038-43bf-9ab7-15e6f656691e
dashboardCharts.displayName: BUSINESS SERVICE IPS BY TRUST LEVEL
dashboardCharts.description: Distribution of known business services by trust level (1=High Trust, 2=Medium Trust)

dashboardCharts.name: 4319904a-c67f-40f9-b73a-cd8313e4efc1
dashboardCharts.description: Top source countries of origin for the identified IPs.

markdown.content:
## Classification Distribution
---
Overview of IP classifications and trust levels. Use these charts to understand the threat landscape and identify the proportion of malicious vs benign traffic.

dashboardCharts.name: 0dd2fd75-57ef-4018-aba8-88a22fc4308a
dashboardCharts.description: Count of IPs classified as 'benign' (harmless scanners or known services).

dashboardCharts.name: b42502a6-3fae-4bb6-837d-e97cfc37c464
dashboardCharts.description: Count of IPs classified as 'SUSPICIOUS' by GreyNoise Internet Scanner Intelligence.

dashboardCharts.name: 51357e65-2e4e-49b6-b573-1d3d8b969144
dashboardCharts.description: Top threat actors (e.g., Mirai, Cobalt Strike) identified by GreyNoise.

dashboardCharts.name: 3f1267d0-b65d-4c39-9140-a6126137f4fb
dashboardCharts.description: Distribution of IPs by their classification (malicious, suspicious, benign, unknown).

markdown.content:
## Top 10 Analytics
---
Key insights into the most prevalent entities in GreyNoise data. Analyze top organizations, threat actors, behavioral tags, ASNs, operating systems, and geographic locations.

dashboardCharts.name: c721dac5-c11b-4e41-8149-8a09dcb9626a
dashboardCharts.description: Displays recently ingested IP indicators with their verdict, summary, and link to GreyNoise.

query.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = graph.entity.ip
$ip = ${ip}
$cves = graph.entity.asset.vulnerabilities.cve_id
match:
    $cves

dashboardCharts.name: 4e7f2270-cb07-452c-918f-6f405fe25d24
dashboardCharts.description: Count of IPs classified as 'MALICIOUS' by GreyNoise Internet Scanner Intelligence.

dashboardCharts.name: 71bde666-5c40-446c-baf2-6087c48c6a1c
dashboardCharts.description: Top network categories for the identified IPs (e.g., isp, business, education).

dashboardQueries.name: 96fb5157-a97c-4b4e-a900-55d09848c5ed
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$tag = graph.entity.artifact.tags
$tag != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $tag
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 3f24c0a5-3ac4-49b0-a800-53d0c5a169ab
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$verdict = graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
outcome:
    $all_counts = count_distinct($entityid)

dashboardQueries.name: e52c1842-9210-4dd1-9942-38def0bdda24
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$actor = graph.additional.fields["internet_scanner_actor"]
$actor != ""
$actor != "unknown"
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $actor
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 8d39c802-ff92-49e2-84e2-b91c23253c50
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$organization = graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.organization_name
$organization != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $organization
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: d3b3eabf-9021-4df4-88c9-8a1e6f0d0109
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = graph.entity.ip
$threat_verdict = graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict
$description = graph.metadata.threat.summary
$greynoise_link = graph.metadata.threat.url_back_to_product
$is_live_investigation = graph.additional.fields["is_live_investigation"]
$is_live_investigation = "true"
$source_country = if(graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.location.country_or_region !="", graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.location.country_or_region, "-")
$organization = if(graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.organization_name!="", graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.organization_name, "-")
$time = timestamp.get_timestamp(graph.metadata.collected_timestamp.seconds, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
$bussiness_found = strings.to_upper(graph.additional.fields["business_service_found"])
$trust = if(graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"] !="", graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"], "-")
$actor= strings.to_upper(if(graph.additional.fields["internet_scanner_actor"]!="",graph.additional.fields["internet_scanner_actor"],"-"))
$asn = if(graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.asn!="",graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.asn, "-")
match:
    $ip, $threat_verdict, $description, $greynoise_link, $bussiness_found, $source_country, $organization, $trust, $actor, $asn
outcome:
    $last_seen = window.last(graph.metadata.collected_timestamp.seconds, $time)
order:
    $last_seen desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 7be69620-aa57-4359-ac9d-b676121c7988
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$asn = graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.asn
$asn != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $asn
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 05258064-f6bb-4c41-9162-748cdcfb9ce3
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$date = timestamp.get_timestamp(graph.metadata.interval.start_time.seconds, "%Y-%m-%d")
$verdict = graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $date, $verdict
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $date asc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 185979e0-4ba0-4f3a-b01f-f63984704a09
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict = "SUSPICIOUS"
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)

dashboardQueries.name: fbe5dcf6-99d5-4e6c-95b3-50854845979d
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = graph.metadata.product_entity_id 
$business_service_found = graph.additional.fields["business_service_found"]
$business_service_found = "true"
$trust_level = graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"]
$trust_level != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $trust_level
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $trust_level asc

dashboardQueries.name: 3631e426-9f58-45d2-97bd-430d62bb0d6e
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$country = graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.location.country_or_region
$country != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $country
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: 086244b9-55b5-4b0d-a0bc-368552521ead
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.additional.fields["business_service_found"] = "true"
$ip = graph.entity.ip
$trust_level = graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"]
$category = graph.metadata.threat.category_details
$description = graph.metadata.description
$summary = graph.metadata.threat.summary
$name = graph.additional.fields["business_service_name"]
$reference = if(graph.additional.fields["business_service_reference"]!="", graph.additional.fields["business_service_reference"],"-")
$last_seen = graph.additional.fields["business_service_last_updated"]
match:
    $ip, $category, $name, $trust_level, $summary, $description, $reference, $last_seen
order:
    $last_seen desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 022800f2-fb80-45d0-95d1-8f19f464c8a8
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$cve = graph.entity.asset.vulnerabilities.cve_id
$cve != ""
$ip = graph.entity.ip
match:
    $cve
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($ip)
    $affected_ips = array_distinct($ip)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 98ba5cf0-aa37-4d56-97ff-46f4c5d68d69
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$verdict = graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $verdict
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc

dashboardQueries.name: 91ad42b7-878e-4257-90e4-b6061a1d7841
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$os = graph.additional.fields["os"]
$os != ""
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:
    $os
outcome:
    $count = count_distinct($entityid)
order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: b093b6aa-a5dc-4355-b034-24617477a10d
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$ip = graph.entity.ip
$threat_verdict = graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict
$summary = graph.metadata.threat.summary
$greynoise_link = graph.metadata.threat.url_back_to_product
$bot = strings.to_upper(graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["bot"])
$tor = strings.to_upper(graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["tor"])
$vpn_Service = if(graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["vpn"]= "true", graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["vpn_service"], "-")
$source_country = graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.location.country_or_region
$organization = if(graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.organization_name!="", graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.organization_name, "-")
$time = timestamp.get_timestamp(graph.metadata.collected_timestamp.seconds, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
$bussiness_found = strings.to_upper(graph.additional.fields["business_service_found"])
$trust = if(graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"] !="", graph.metadata.threat.detection_fields["business_service_trust_level"], "-")
$actor= strings.to_upper(graph.additional.fields["internet_scanner_actor"])
$asn = if(graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.asn!="",graph.entity.ip_geo_artifact.network.asn, "-")
match:
    $ip, $threat_verdict, $summary, $greynoise_link, $bussiness_found, $source_country, $organization, $trust, $actor, $asn, $bot, $tor, $vpn_Service
outcome:
    $all_cves = re.replace((arrays.join_string(array_distinct(if(graph.entity.asset.vulnerabilities.cve_id!="", graph.entity.asset.vulnerabilities.cve_id, "-")),", ")), "(, -)|(-, )","")
    $last_seen = window.last(graph.metadata.collected_timestamp.seconds, $time)
order:
    $last_seen desc
limit:
    10000

dashboardQueries.name: 773c77f7-537f-4745-a994-0440ca5803e0
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict = "UNDETECTED"
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
outcome:
    $benign_count = count_distinct($entityid)

dashboardQueries.name: 2cfa89eb-7f5f-4540-a24d-caeea9fec7d8
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$category = graph.metadata.threat.category_details
graph.additional.fields["business_service_found"] = "true"
$category != "" 
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
match:

outcome:

order:
    $count desc
limit:
    10

dashboardQueries.name: c6912a37-acbb-45ae-a3ef-5349a0845087
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict = "MALICIOUS"
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
outcome:

dashboardQueries.name: c4a631e7-f3ff-4c88-8b5f-ff4fed096596
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
$category = graph.additional.fields["network_category"]
$category != "" 
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id

dashboardQueries.name: 07e73d0e-eb68-45b5-a234-066e4954e241
dashboardQueries.query:
graph.metadata.vendor_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.product_name = "GreyNoise Intelligence"
graph.metadata.threat.threat_verdict = "THREAT_VERDICT_UNSPECIFIED"
$entityid = graph.metadata.product_entity_id
outcome:
    $unknown_count = count_distinct($entityid)
